title: Brand New, top floor w exterior view, parking & appliances included!
posting_body: ['ALIVIA APARTMENTS IS YOUR EVERYDAY GETAWAY WITH 1 & 2 BEDROOM APARTMENTS NEAR SANTA FE SPRINGS, CA', 'Alivia Apartments near Santa Fe Springs, CA makes living a great life easy.', 'With thoughtful amenities, spacious floor plans, and convenient access to everything Los Angeles and Orange counties have to offer, Alivia is a breath of fresh air ready to remind you to relax and enjoy the moment.', 'Our 1 and 2 bedroom homes have been tastefully composed with designer touches at every turn because we know that the details matter.', 'Designed around a central courtyard, each home in our community has large windows that allow in lots of natural light and a scenic patio or balcony to help you soak up the Southern California sunshine.', 'Inside, you’ll find a kitchen island with plenty of storage, sizeable closets, and sleek, modern design elements at every turn.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 728 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Built-in desk*', '- Mosaic tile kitchen backsplash', '- Dishwasher', '- Kitchen island with storage', '- Polished quartz countertops', '- Microwave', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Furnished options', '- Covered private patio, terrace or balcony', '- Gas range', '- Framed vanity mirrors', '- Roman-style soaking tubs*', '- Wood-style plank flooring in the kitchen and living areas', '- Ceiling fans in living room and main bedroom', '- Oversized closets*', '- In-home washer and dryer', '- Ceramic tile bathroom floors', '- Refrigerator with ice Thursday: 10:00 am – 7:00 pm', 'Wednesday: 11:00 am – 7:00 pm', 'Friday: 10:00 am to 6:00 pm', 'Saturday: 10:00 am – 5:00 pm', 'Sunday: 12:00 pm – 5:00pm', 'Alivia Apartments', '11201 Carmenita Rd.,
